actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to assist in the continued development of the Indianapolis Central Waterfront project in Indianapolis, Indiana.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Indianapolis Central Waterfront Act of 2002 - Modifies the flood control project in Indianapolis, Indiana, on the Fall Creek Reach of the White River, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to: (1) assist with the Fall Creek Reach element of the Indianapolis Central Waterfront Project; and (2) construct such Project at a total cost of$139.52 million.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to assist in the continued development of the Indianapolis Central Waterfront project in Indianapolis, Indiana.
